Content: A group of 84 students of Ibbagamuwa Central College in recognition of the Army training capabilities joined a workshop on ‘Leadership and Positive Thinking’ at 5 Sri Lanka Armoured Corps Training Centre in Pangolla during 10 – 11 October. On the instructions of Lieutenant General Mahesh Senanayake, Commander of the Army, students were trained on ‘promotion of leadership qualities, improvement of social discipline, enhancement of vocational training skills, preparation of psychological surroundings to overcome challenges, cultivation of good social perspectives, maintenance of mental balance, etc. Some teachers also attended the workshop.
